00020 #ifndef __DATASETTEST_FSTREAMLOADENTIREDATASET_H_
00021 #define __DATASETTEST_FSTREAMLOADENTIREDATASET_H_
00022 
00023 #include <cppunit/extensions/HelperMacros.h>
00024 #include "GenericData.h"
00025 
00026 /*
00027  * This tests the basic functions of the DataSet class using fstream to read data.
00028  * The fixture creates DataSets that read all DataSet data into a memory buffer.
00029  * Other tests exercise features to handle different
00030  * data types, column arrangements, memory footprints
00031  * and multiple DataSets referencing the same file.
00032  */
00033 class DataSetTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture  
00034 {
00035         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(DataSetTest_FStreamLoadEntireDataSet);
00036 
00037         CPPUNIT_TEST (testCreation);
00038         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_Delete);
00039         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_Open);
00040         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_Close);
00041         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_BytesPerRow);
00042         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_Rows);
00043         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_Cols);
00044         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_Header);
00045         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single);
00046         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector);
00047         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_TooManyRows);
00048         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_InChunks);
00049         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw);
00050         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_TooManyRows);
00051         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_InChunks);
00052         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_DataSetNotOpenException);
00053         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_ColumnOutOfBoundsException);
00054         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_RowOutofBoundsException);
00055         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_UnexpectedColumnTypeException);
00056         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single_DataSetNotOpenException);
00057         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_DataSetNotOpenException);
00058         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_DataSetNotOpenException);
00059 
00060         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
